body:
Comment 2: 
For up-to-dateness:

Most of the work for amd64 was done in http://golang.org/cl/152142
386 work done in http://golang.org/cl/157055

Still some work to go (I'd like to do a FreeBSD/arm port maybe), but this should be good
for the vast majority of 
users. Still needs cgo and libmach on both archs.
